name: Ravioli and Pasta Masterclass
description:
Ladies, we have something yummy planned for you! 
Join us for a wine induced, hands-on, Ravioli and Pasta Masterclass designed especially for you ladies! In this cooking demo, you will learn to create two types of ravioli with different fillings, along with two shapes of pasta, all paired with three different types of sauces 
The chef invite 3-4 volunteers to step forward and try their hand at shaping the pasta, while everyone else will have the opportunity to touch and feel the dough to understand the ideal consistency and texture. 
At the end of the class, you’ll also get to sample the freshly made pasta dishes 
Note: the pasta dough will contain eggs 
 What’s Included: 
 
 A stylish Toscano giveaway bag  
 Recipe sheets for each dish so you can try them at home 
 A delightful High Tea to round off the experience 
 3 glasses of Grover Zampa wine per person! 
 
Don’t miss this opportunity to indulge in some fine Italian cooking

location.name: Toscano
location.address: Museum Rd,  Shanthala Nagar,  Ashok Nagar,  Bengaluru,  Karnataka 560001

name: Pickleball with the Sisters (GoRally x SIS)
description:
LADIES! 
We have something new planned for you! 
Come try a new and easy to learn sport with us! 
Pickleball is one of the fastest growing sports in the world and we are here to help you learn! 
 
These sessions are 'Play-Only' sessions. No coaching involved. Pickleball is a very easy sport to pick-up and play, there’s hardly a need for coaching beyond the basics. However, there will be experts at the facility that can guide you, if you require. 
 
There are 2 courts booked for this session, and it's 4 people active at one court at a time.  
 
These sessions are only One-Hour long, so we recommend arriving 15minutes early to finish up your warm-up and to maximise the one-hour. 
 
Some points to note: 
* Paddle & ball (equipment) will be available at the venue and is included in the cost of the workshop and sessions 
* Wear training/sports shoes, not running shoes. Running shoes have a taller sole profile, built for uni-directional movement only, while the sole profile of training/sports shoes are closer to the ground and are built for multi-directional movement 
* The venue has a cute F&B counter, in case you'd like some refreshments 
* ⁠The venue has clean washrooms for women, equipped with a shower, hair dryer etc 
* ⁠Parking is available at the venue 
 
Enjoy this new sport Sister! 
 
Any issues, please contact:  
Tanvie: 8800199418

name: Footy with the Sisters - Intermediate - Ulsoor
description:
FOOTY WITH THE SISTERS - INTERMEDIATE SESSIONS 
Bring out those football boots or shoes and remember to clean 'em nice! We're getting on the field to play the Beautiful game! 
This will be full 90mins session consisting of a warmup, technical ball drills, gametime and cool down. Since this is an intermediate level session, it is necessary that you have a bit of prior experience playing Football. Not recommended for complete beginners. 
What to wear? Comfortable workout clothes, incase you don't have access to football studs/turf shoes, training shoes would be sufficient. 
What to bring? A bottle of water, a towel to wipe off sweat (if required) and loads of enthusiasm to play :) 
See you on the field Sisters!! 
 
Contact: Samara 
9902082782 
Vibha  
8073681373

name: B'Ball with the Sisters - Intermediate
description:
BBALL WITH THE SISTERS - FRIDAY - INTERMEDIATE SESSIONS: 
Bring out those kicks and get your bounce on, we're getting out on the court to play some BALL !! 
These sessions are open to all women at the intermediate level! The basketball drills will be designed to both push you and at the same time, build on your existing basics! A bit of prior playing experience is required, not recommended for beginners. Each session is 90mins long, and will consist of a warm-up, basketball drills which are fun and athletic, a small game and a cool down at the end. It is a super fun start to your day and apart from that, even helps you get in your cardio for the day! 
What to wear? Comfortable workout clothes, incase you don't have access to basketball shoes, training shoes would be sufficient. 
What to bring? A bottle of water, a towel to wipe off sweat (if required) and loads of enthusiasm to play :) See you on the field Sisters!! 
 
Contact: Aishwary 9738012622

name: Baddy with the Sisters - Saturday
description:
Bring out your Racquets ladies!! We're going to play some badminton! 
Details : Day - Saturday Location - PlayZone Indiranagar  
What do I do if I don't have a racquet and non-marking shoes?  Racquets and non-marking shoes are mandatory, but if you don't have them the court offers them for rent at the following costs. - Racquet - Rs.30 per hour - Non-marking shoes - Rs.30 per hour. 
We're super excited! Join us and we'll see you on the court. 
For any further queries, please feel free to reach out to us. 
 
Contact: 
Aishwarya Bharathi 
9738012622

name: Run with the Sisters
description:
SIS Run Club @Cubbon park 
Meeting Point:  
We meet at Cafe Coffee Day square at 6:50am, and walk to the spot inside Cubbon Park 
 
Read further for the details of the run! 
1. Distance : 3km & 5km 
2. Level : Open to all including beginners 
3. Reporting time : 6:45am 
4. Reporting point : We meet at Cafe Coffee Day square at 6:45am, and walk to the spot inside Cubbon Park 
 5. Run venue : Cubbon park  
6. Things to carry : Water bottle and a few buckets of enthusiasm! 
7. Format : Warm-up, Run, Cool down. 
Please note that you will have an expert pacer guiding you through the entire session from start to finish!  
Let's get those running shoes on ladies!! Sign-up and join us now! 
 
Contact: 
Aishwarya Bharathi 
9738012622
